name: Hamatula Strike
text: You can catch your opponents on your weapon and hold them in place.
prerequisites: Improved Grapple, Strength 13, Base Attack Bonus +7.
benefit: Whenever you damage an opponent with a piercing weapon, you can immediately make a grapple check; success means the opponent is impaled on your weapon and you both gain the grappled condition.
